top_negative.sent: Acetaminophen Matters Since August 2022, more than 50 personal injury cases have been filed in federal court against Dollar Tree, Family Dollar, or both, on behalf of minors alleging that their mothers took acetaminophen while pregnant, that the acetaminophen interfered with fetal development such that plaintiffs were born with autism and/or ADHD, and that we knew or should have known of the danger, had a duty to warn and failed to include appropriate warnings on the product labels.

forward_snippets: We expect that the remaining inventory losses and property and equipment losses will be fully offset by insurance recoveries under our distribution center insurance policies.
We continue to assess these estimates and will recognize any changes to these estimates in the period(s) in which they are determined.
We will vigorously defend ourselves in these matters.
We expect that the remaining inventory losses and property and equipment losses will be fully offset by insurance recoveries under our distribution center insurance policies.
We continue to assess these estimates and will recognize any changes to these estimates in the period(s) in which they are determined.
